forecast.name: Today
forecast.shortForecast: Partly Sunny then Chance Rain Showers
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers after 3pm. Partly sunny. High near 58, with temperatures falling to around 42 in the afternoon. Southwest wind around 16 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 16. West wind around 17 mph, with gusts as high as 33 mph.

weather_report:
In Boston today, a touch of unpredictability looms in the air, with hints of warmth trying to break through the clouded sky. As the afternoon approaches, you may encounter a fleeting sprinkle of rain, a reminder of winter’s lingering grip before it eventually yields. Those venturing outdoors should prepare for a brisk experience, as a steady southwest wind carries a chill, eager to remind you to layer up before stepping out. While you might catch glimpses of sun, it's best to don a warm jacket, maybe even a scarf, to ward off the biting gusts. 

As the day meanders toward evening, skies will clear, but don’t expect a balmy farewell; temperatures will dive into the depths of winter’s embrace. With the air growing crisper, it’s an ideal time to find solace in a cozy café, where the warmth of a drink cradles your hands, or perhaps to enjoy a stroll along the waterfront, wrapped snugly in your attire. Today offers moments of light amidst the chill, inviting quiet reflection on the changing season while the wind whispers stories of spring just around the corner.
